Common.videoDisclosure: Videos are embedded from YouTube and belong to their respective creators.

Home.badge: Built for the Rocket League grind
Home.heroSub: Train smarter. Track progress. Find reliable teammates.
Home.heroNote: No Rocket League API required. Your progress stays yours.
Home.whyTitle: Discord is great for chat. AERIX is built for progress.
Home.pillar1b: Consistency score so you see your discipline
Home.pillar2Desc: No more random free play sessions.
Home.pillar2a: Tiered programs matched to your rank
Home.pillar2b: Curated training packs with video guides
Home.pillar3Desc: Find teammates who actually show up.
Home.pillar3b: Safer and more reliable than Discord LFG
Home.step1Desc: Tell us your rank, playlist, and what you want to improve. Onboarding takes 30 seconds.
Home.step2Desc: Follow your training plan, queue up packs, or jump into matchmaking when you want a duo.
Home.step3Desc: Track streaks, weekly progress, and rank check-ins. The data shows what's working.
Home.plansTitle: Free to grind. Upgrade when you're ready.
Home.packsDesc: Curated drill packs for aerials, shooting, saves, and more. Queue them up and grind with purpose.
Home.updatesDesc: Stay current on patches, meta shifts, and what they mean for your training. Written for players, not patch note robots.
Home.previewTitle: Built for players who want to improve.
Home.preview_dashboard_desc: Your daily hub for streaks, weekly goals, and consistency tracking.
Home.preview_dashboard_a: Daily streak + weekly progress at a glance
Home.preview_dashboard_b: Recommended training packs based on your level
Home.preview_training_desc: Follow structured sessions with video guides and checklists.
Home.preview_training_a: Tiered programs: Free, Starter, and Pro
Home.preview_training_b: Mark drills done and track session focus
Home.preview_progress_desc: See your streaks, rank trends, and session history over time.
Home.preview_matchmaking_desc: Find reliable teammates by rank, region, and playlist.
Home.preview_matchmaking_a: Post or browse LFG requests with filters
Home.footerCta: Ready for your next rank-up streak?

Pricing.title: Simple pricing, no surprises.
Pricing.subtitle: Free to start training. Upgrade for deeper tools. Cancel anytime.
Pricing.starterNote: See what you practiced, how long, and what's improving — all in one place.
Pricing.whyPayDesc: Free gives you real training tools — streaks, progress, and session notes. Starter and Pro unlock more drills, deeper tracking, and personalized insights so you can see patterns in how you practice. We build for players who want to improve, and every dollar goes back into making AERIX better.
Pricing.priceNote: Prices shown in {currency}. We adjust pricing by region to keep things fair.

Login.title: Sign in
Login.subtitle: Enter your email to receive a magic link.
Login.sentLink: We sent a sign-in link to {email}

Dashboard.label: Dashboard
Dashboard.welcomeSub: Here's where you are. Keep showing up — that's all it takes.
Dashboard.nudge: Reminder: quick session today keeps your goal on track.
Dashboard.welcomeBanner: Welcome — your plan is set. Ready for your first session?
Dashboard.setupSub: Two quick picks so AERIX can guide you better.
Dashboard.goalSaved: Saved. Let's get a clean week in.
Dashboard.trialSub: Enjoying the extra features? Keep them after your trial.
Dashboard.trialEnded: Trial ended — you can keep training on Free or upgrade anytime.
Dashboard.tryStarterSub: Unlock more training blocks, focus tags, and insights.
Dashboard.streakTip0: Start a new streak today. One session is all it takes.
Dashboard.trainedSub: You showed up today. Come back tomorrow.
Dashboard.notTrainedSub: Your daily session is waiting. Even a short one counts.
Dashboard.clickToggle: Click any day to toggle your training.
Dashboard.librarySub: Save drills and build your next session.
Dashboard.packsSub: Curated drill bundles for specific skills.
Dashboard.updatesSub: Patch notes, meta shifts, and what to train next.
Dashboard.teamSub: Team up with players who match your rank and goals.
Dashboard.inviteSub: Both of you get +7 days Starter trial time.
Dashboard.saveSub: If you miss a day, use a save to keep your streak going.

Training.label: Daily Training
Training.motivationConsistency: Small sessions daily beat big sessions sometimes.
Training.motivationMechanics: Mechanics are built one rep at a time.
Training.motivationRank: Every rank-up starts with the boring stuff.
Training.warmupDesc: 5–10 minutes of free play to loosen up.
Training.trainingFocusDesc: Work through today's guided blocks below.
Training.freePlayDesc: Run a training pack or just play with intention.
Training.reviewDesc: Think about what clicked and what felt off today.
Training.programDesc: Watch, practice, and check off each block when you're done. No rush — even one block is progress.
Training.nOfTotalChecked: {n} of {total} checked — do what you can.
Training.showedUpDesc: That's progress. It doesn't matter if the session was short or messy — you did the work. Come back tomorrow.
Training.sessionNotesSub: Quick reflection — no pressure, just a few words.
Training.focusNext: What will you focus on tomorrow?
Training.focusTagsSub: What did you work on today? Pick up to 2.
Training.durationSub: Roughly how long did you train?
Training.seeIncluded: See what's included in other plans
Training.lockedDesc: Full program is part of {label} so we can keep quality high and support ongoing video curation.
Training.embedFallback: If the embed doesn't load, use 'Watch on YouTube'.
Training.noQueueDesc: Add drills to your queue from the library to start a session.
Training.sessionCompleteSub: You worked through {n} drill(s). Queue cleared — add more from the library anytime.
Training.queueDesc: Work through each drill in order. Mark done when you're ready to move on.

TrainingPlan.label: Training
TrainingPlan.title: Weekly Training Plan
TrainingPlan.desc: Structured practice beats random grinding. Follow this plan to build real skill — one focused session at a time.

Progress.label: Progress Insights
Progress.title: Your progress.
Progress.desc: Consistency compounds. Here's proof you're showing up.
Progress.emptySub: Complete your first session and your progress will appear here.
Progress.insightStart: Start with one session today — everything builds from there.
Progress.noFocusTags: No focus tags yet. Tag what you practiced after each session.
Progress.insightsLocked: Starter unlocks insights that connect your focus + time + consistency.
Progress.topFocus: Top focus: {tag} — tagged {n} times this week.
Progress.noFocusWeek: No focus tags this week — try tagging after your next session.
Progress.noNotes: No session notes yet. Complete a training session and reflect on what went well.
Progress.signInPrompt: Sign in to sync your data across devices and unlock plan features.

Packs.label: Premium Content
Packs.title: Training Packs
Packs.desc: Curated drill bundles to level up specific skills. Save or queue an entire pack in one click.
Packs.saveLimitReached: Save limit reached ({limit}). Upgrade for more.

Library.label: Training Library
Library.title: Your drills.
Library.desc: Save drills you like. Queue up your next session.
Library.savedEmpty: No saved drills yet. Browse the catalog to save some.
Library.queueEmpty: Your next session queue is empty.
Library.freeLimitSave: Free limit reached (5). Upgrade for more.
Library.freeLimitQueue: Free plan: 1 queued drill. Upgrade for more.

Updates.label: Updates
Updates.title: Rocket League Patch Notes
Updates.desc: Latest patches and updates straight from Rocket League — so you know what changed before you queue up.
Updates.errorLoading: Could not load patch notes right now.
Updates.disclaimer: Updates are sourced from Rocket League news and link to the original post.
Updates.sourceNote: Source content may be in English.

Matchmaking.label: Matchmaking
Matchmaking.title: Find your team.
Matchmaking.desc: Looking for a duo or trio? Post your rank and style, or browse players looking to team up.
Matchmaking.emptyTitle: No one's looking for a team yet
Matchmaking.emptySub: Post your rank and playlist to find teammates.
Matchmaking.createSub: Let others know what you're looking for.
Matchmaking.notePlaceholder: Play style, availability, what you're working on…
Matchmaking.alreadyPosted: You already have an open post. Close it to create a new one.
Matchmaking.alreadyOpen: You already have an open post. Close it first.
Matchmaking.addNote: Add a short note about yourself.
Matchmaking.createFailed: Failed to create post. Try again.
Matchmaking.upgradeRequired: Upgrade to Starter+ to create posts.

MatchmakingPost.ownPost: This is your post. Others will contact you via messages.
MatchmakingPost.upgradeCta: Upgrade to Starter+ to contact players.
MatchmakingPost.requestAccepted: Request accepted! You can now chat.

MessagesPage.label: Inbox
MessagesPage.title: Messages
MessagesPage.emptySub: Connect with players in matchmaking to start chatting.

Thread.blockedBanner: You blocked this user. Messaging is disabled.
Thread.waitingFor: Waiting for {name} to respond. You'll be able to chat once they accept.
Thread.acceptOrDecline: Accept to start chatting, or decline if you're not interested.
Thread.chatPending: Chat will be available once the request is accepted.

Settings.setupFirst: Set up your preferences first to use Settings.
Settings.label: Settings
Settings.title: Your preferences.
Settings.reminderSub: Get a nudge on your dashboard on training days.
Settings.reminderNote: This is an in-app reminder for now. We'll add notifications later.
Settings.profileSub: Share your progress page with anyone.
Settings.usernameHint: 3-20 characters, lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores only.
Settings.dataWarning: This removes all local training data, preferences, and progress from this browser. This cannot be undone.
Settings.confirmReset: Reset all local AERIX data? This cannot be undone.

Paywall.title: This feature is part of a paid plan
Paywall.desc: Some features — like finding teammates and community tools — are available on Starter and Pro plans.
Paywall.reason1Desc: Paid features help us keep the community focused on players who genuinely want to improve together.
Paywall.reason2Desc: Matchmaking and team features need active maintenance. Subscriptions let us keep them running smoothly.
Paywall.reason3Desc: Your daily training, streak system, and progress tracking are always free. Paid plans add extras on top.
Paywall.starterFeatures: Duo/Trio finder, training history, streak protection
Paywall.proFeatures: Everything in Starter, plus priority matching & summaries

PlanFree.label: Free Plan
PlanFree.title: Solo training, zero cost.
PlanFree.desc: The free plan gives you everything you need to build a daily training habit. No credit card, no trial, no catch — just structured practice for Rocket League.
PlanFree.feat1Desc: Log your sessions and build a streak. Consistency is what separates improving players from stuck players.
PlanFree.feat2Desc: See your current and best streak. Know when you showed up and when you didn't.
PlanFree.feat3Desc: Review your recent sessions and session notes. Enough to reflect without overload.
PlanFree.notIncNote: Matchmaking and team features are part of paid plans. Free is designed for solo improvement — and that's totally valid.
PlanFree.getStartedNote: No account needed to explore. Just jump in.

PlanStarter.label: Starter Plan
PlanStarter.title: Train hard. Play together.
PlanStarter.desc: The Starter plan unlocks the tools that help you train with more depth — and find teammates who care about improving. It's built for players who are ready to go beyond solo free play.
PlanStarter.feat1Desc: Find teammates who match your rank and goals. Request-to-play keeps things safe.
PlanStarter.feat2Desc: Review past weeks, track your focus tags over time, and spot patterns.
PlanStarter.feat3Desc: 1 save per month. Miss a day without losing your streak.
PlanStarter.whoDesc: Players who are grinding consistently and want better teammates, deeper insights, and a bit of protection when life gets in the way. You're past casual — Starter meets you there.

PlanPro.label: Pro Plan
PlanPro.title: Built for the grind.
PlanPro.desc: Pro is for players who treat improvement as a system. You want the deepest data, the best teammates, and tools that match how seriously you take your sessions.
PlanPro.feat1Desc: Your posts appear first. Higher visibility with other serious players.
PlanPro.feat2Desc: More protection for your streak when real life interrupts.
PlanPro.feat3Desc: Auto-generated reports on your training patterns, focus shifts, and consistency trends.
PlanPro.feat4Desc: Protect longer streaks with additional monthly saves.
PlanPro.whoDesc: Competitive grinders. If you care about rank trends, want team tools that work, and want the deepest insights AERIX offers — Pro is for you.

UpgradeSuccess.activatingSub: This usually takes a few seconds.
UpgradeSuccess.title: You're in.

Play.title: Play
Play.desc: Jump into a session and put your training to the test.
Play.quickMatchDesc: Get matched with opponents at your skill level.
Play.soloDrillDesc: Practice on your own with guided exercises.
Play.challengeDesc: Compete in timed challenges and climb the leaderboard.

Profile.title: Profile
Profile.desc: Your stats, progress, and account settings.

Rank.label: Rank Check-in
Rank.title: Log your rank.
Rank.desc: Quick rank check-in (30 seconds). Track your climb over time.
Rank.freeNote: Free plan keeps your latest 3 check-ins.
Rank.notePlaceholder: e.g. Felt confident in rotations today

Invite.label: Referrals
Invite.title: Invite a teammate.
Invite.desc: Share your code — both of you get +7 days Starter trial time.
Invite.codeError: Could not generate referral code. Try reloading.
Invite.step1: 1. Share your code or link with a friend.
Invite.step2: 2. They sign up and enter the code during onboarding.
Invite.step3: 3. Both of you get +7 days of Starter trial time.

Onboarding.goalSub: Pick what matters most right now. You can always change this later.
Onboarding.playlistTitle: Which playlist do you play most?
Onboarding.playlistSub: We'll tailor your training plan around this mode.
Onboarding.rankSub: Optional — helps us recommend the right drills for your level.
Onboarding.skipNote: No worries — you can set your rank anytime from the dashboard.
Onboarding.referralSub: Got a code from a friend? Both of you get +7 days Starter.

Feedback.label: Feedback
Feedback.title: Help us improve.
Feedback.desc: Spotted something off or have an idea? Tell us.
Feedback.placeholder: What happened? What would you change?

PublicProfile.notFoundSub: This profile doesn't exist or isn't public yet.
PublicProfile.tagline: Rocket League grind — tracked on AERIX
